TABLE.NAME: parentseve
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to hold instances of parents evenings

FIELD.NAME: reviewid
FIELD.COMMENT: This will link to a front page parent review

FIELD.NAME: info
FIELD.COMMENT: this will be displayed to people booking appointments, probably want to put in a phone number for help and details of where the parents evening will be held

TABLE.NAME: parentseve_app
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to hold all the appointments that have been booked

FIELD.NAME: teacherid
FIELD.COMMENT: Teacher that the appointment is with, links to the user table

FIELD.NAME: apptime
FIELD.COMMENT: time of the appointment in unix timestamp format; will be starttime+n*duration

FIELD.NAME: parentname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is designed to work when parents dont have accounts- just accept a name and store it as supplied (after cleaning of course)

FIELD.NAME: studentname
FIELD.COMMENT: Parents booking appointments are not authenticated, so cannot validate students name without giving out information about students. Will have to just store and present this as supplied
